long_description: Infused with a lightweight wood core, the women's Icelantic Oracle skis are at ease in any situation on the mountain thanks to their easy-to-maneuver rockered tips and wide, stable waists. Early rise in the tips combines with a standard camber underfoot to provide excellent control in powder and responsive carving on hardpack. 100mm waists float high in powder and offer stability in variable snow. Designed to for the performance and comfort of women skiers, the wood core is very light yet offers the same strength and pop as men's models. Multiple layers of fiberglass are layered around a very lightweight wood core to provide high responsiveness. Slightly tapered design creates a forward-facing, deep stance for women who ski and turn aggresively. P-tex sidewalls and layers of rubber foil enhance edge grip and reduce vibrations. The 100mm waists of the women's Icelantic Oracle skis require bindings with wide brakes. Base or topsheet color may vary from online photo.
short_description: Infused with a lightweight wood core, the women's Icelantic Oracle skis are at ease in any situation on the mountain thanks to their easy-to-maneuver rockered tips and wide, stable waists.
